title: User Registration with Role Selection
description: Verify that users can register successfully by selecting either job seeker or recruiter role, and data is correctly persisted.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill in the registration form with valid user details.
Select 'Job Seeker' role.
Submit the registration form.
Verify that registration is successful and user receives confirmation.
Verify that the user record is created in the database with role 'Job Seeker'.
Repeat registration selecting 'Recruiter' role and verify similarly.

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Check that job seekers and recruiters can log in successfully with correct credentials and are redirected to their role-specific dashboards.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password for a job seeker.
Submit login.
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to job seeker dashboard.
Log out and repeat login for a recruiter user.
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to recruiter dashboard.

title: Admin Login with Optional Two-Factor Authentication
description: Verify admin can log in with correct credentials and optional 2FA when enabled; login is rejected otherwise.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin login portal.
Enter valid admin username and password.
If 2FA is enabled for the admin account, system prompts for 2FA code.
Enter valid 2FA code and submit.
Verify login is successful and admin dashboard is displayed.
Attempt login with invalid 2FA code.
Verify login is denied with appropriate error.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Ensure users cannot access features or APIs not permitted for their roles; unauthorized access returns appropriate errors.

steps.description: Log in as a job seeker.
Attempt to access recruiter-only APIs or UI pages.
Verify access is denied with authorization error.
Log in as a recruiter.
Attempt to access admin-only management APIs.
Verify access is denied appropriately.
Attempt to call APIs with expired or invalid JWT tokens.
Verify requests are rejected with authentication errors.

title: Job Seeker Resume Management and ATS Scanning
description: Verify job seekers can create, update, delete multiple resumes and perform ATS scan with Resume-Matcher integration showing scan results.

steps.description: Log in as a job seeker and navigate to resume builder.
Create a new resume using template selection.
Verify the new resume is saved and listed.
Run ATS scan on the resume.
Verify ATS optimization suggestions are returned and displayed correctly.
Edit and update the resume, then save.
Confirm changes persist successfully.
Delete a resume and verify it no longer appears in the list.

title: Job Seeker Job Browsing, Filtering, and Application Tracking
description: Test that job seekers can browse jobs with filters, save or apply for jobs, and track status via application management.

steps.description: Log in as job seeker and open job browsing page.
Apply various filters like location, job type, and keywords.
Verify job listings reflect filter criteria accurately.
Save a job for later reference and verify it appears in saved jobs.
Apply to a job from the listings.
Confirm application is recorded and application status tracking is available.
Check application status updates and interview scheduling linked to application.

title: Recruiter Profile Management, Job Posting and Editing
description: Ensure recruiters can view, update their profiles and create, update, or delete job postings with changes reflected in the system.

steps.description: Log in as recruiter and navigate to profile.
Verify profile data loads correctly.
Update profile fields and save changes.
Verify updates persist.
Create a new job posting with valid data.
New job appears in recruiter's job listing and database.
Edit an existing job posting and save.
Verify changes are updated correctly.
Delete a job posting.
Confirm the job is removed from the listings.

title: Recruiter Applicant Review and Auto-Ranking
description: Verify recruiters can view applicant lists for their jobs, and applicants are ranked automatically based on ATS scores.

steps.description: Log in as recruiter and navigate to applicants for a posted job.
Applicant list loads successfully.
Applicants are sorted by ATS scores in descending order.
Change application statuses (e.g., shortlist, reject).
Status changes are saved and reflected appropriately.

title: Recruiter Interview Scheduling and Candidate Emails
description: Test the ability to schedule interviews for candidates and send email notifications via recruiter dashboard.

steps.description: Log in as recruiter and select a candidate for interview scheduling.
Schedule interview with date/time and location details.
Interview details are saved and visible in interviews list.
Send email notification to candidate via system email function.
Candidate receives email; system reports successful send.

title: Admin User and Recruiter Management and Suspension
description: Verify admin can view user and recruiter lists, suspend or verify accounts, and changes persist and reflect in system behavior.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to user management dashboard.
User and recruiter lists load with pagination.
Suspend a user or recruiter account.
Suspended account is marked accordingly and cannot access protected areas.
Verify (activate) a suspended account.
Account access is restored as expected.

title: Admin System Logs and Duplicate Account Detection
description: Ensure admin can view system logs with pagination and filtering and detect and manage duplicate accounts effectively.

steps.description: Log in as admin and navigate to system logs.
Logs display consistently with options for pagination and filtering by date or type.
Navigate to duplicate accounts detection dashboard.
Potential duplicates are identified and shown correctly.
Perform management actions on duplicates like merging or flagging.
Actions complete successfully and data integrity is maintained.

title: View Tracking: Unique Views Recording and Rate Limiting
description: Validate that profile and entity views are tracked uniquely per user/session per day, with rate limiting to prevent spamming.

steps.description: Simulate views on a user profile and job listing from the same user multiple times in a day.
Verify only one unique view per user/session per day is counted.
Simulate multiple views from different users and anonymous sessions.
Verify unique view counts increase accordingly.
Attempt to exceed rate limit thresholds for view tracking.
Verify that excess requests are limited or ignored per configured rate limiting.

title: View Tracking Analytics Dashboard Data Consistency
description: Check that the frontend analytics dashboard displays accurate daily unique visitor metrics and trends based on backend view tracking data.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open analytics dashboard.
Verify that daily unique view counts and trend charts correspond correctly with data in backend.
Cross-check view counts retrieved via API with displayed data.
Verify real-time updates or refreshes maintain accuracy.

title: API Authentication and Token Validation
description: Test all protected RESTful APIs enforce JWT validation, reject requests with invalid or expired tokens, and comply with role-based access.

steps.description: Attempt API calls with missing Authorization header.
Verify request is denied with 401 Unauthorized.
Attempt API calls with invalid or expired JWT.
Verify request is denied with authentication error.
Call role-protected endpoints with JWT for different roles.
Verify access is allowed or denied in accordance with role permissions.

title: Frontend Responsive Design and Error Handling
description: Verify that the React frontend UI renders correctly across various device sizes and gracefully handles loading states and error scenarios.

steps.description: Load key pages (login, dashboard, job browsing) in desktop, tablet, and mobile viewport sizes.
Verify UI elements scale and rearrange appropriately without overlap or clipping.
Simulate slow network and observe loading indicators.
Loading spinners or placeholders are shown consistently.
Simulate API failure (e.g., backend error or network down).
User-friendly error messages are displayed and UI remains stable.

title: Database Schema Consistency and Migration Integrity
description: Ensure that database schema supports all required entities and fields, migrations run successfully and no placeholder data exists after user registration.

steps.description: Run all database migrations on a fresh test database.
No migration failures occur and schema aligns with PRD requirements.
Register a new user and verify database entries.
No placeholder or static data exists; data corresponds exclusively to input.
Verify presence and correctness of tables for resumes, experiences, education, applications, interviews, logs, views.

title: Environment Variable Security and JWT Secret Management
description: Validate the system uses environment variables correctly without hardcoded secrets, and supports encrypted JWT secrets in production.

steps.description: Review application configuration for environment variable usage.
No hardcoded secrets such as JWT keys or database passwords in source code.
Configure encrypted JWT secret and verify system starts and JWT tokens validate correctly.
Encrypted secrets are successfully decrypted at runtime and functionality is not impaired.
